overview.en: Mining Core Coin (MCC) is a cryptocurrency and operates on the Ethereum platform. Mining Core Coin has a current supply of 500,000,000 with 34,458,624 in circulation. The last known price of Mining Core Coin is 0.00220155 USD and is down -17.86 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 1 active market(s) with $23,467.38 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at https://miningcore.io.
